body.directions: Read each word or phrase in Chinese, and then answer the question.

body.quiz: Which of the following items is most similar in shape to the word presented?
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 铅笔 qiānbǐmeans “pencil,” and 笔 bǐ (pen) has the closest shape to it.
body.incorrect: Very close. Think about the meaning of the word presented, and then consider the items in the choices. Watch out for 笔 and 笔记本, both of which have the same character with the word presented.

body.quiz: Which of the following has the same initial as the 1st character in the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 上午 shàngwǔ (a.m./morning)
options: Audio for 需要 xūyào (to need)
Audio for 到达 dàodá (to arrive)
Audio for 体育课 tǐyùkè (physical education class)
body.correct: Fabulous job! The 1st character 文 wén in the word 文件夹 wénjiànjiā has the initial “w,” while the 2nd character of the word 上午 shàngwǔ (a.m./morning) also has the same initial.
body.incorrect: Not quite… first identify the initial of the 1st character in the word, and then listen to the four words in the choices to see which one contains the same initial.

body.quiz: Which of the following phrases can this word be used to complete?
body.answer: 中文课_____英文课 zhōngwénkè_____ yīngwénkè
options: 上午九_____三十分 shàngwǔ jiǔ_____ sānshífēn
body.correct: You got it! 或是 huòshìmeans “or,” and it is used in a sentence or phrase to indicate selecting among two or more choices.
body.incorrect: So close! Think about the meaning of this word and how it can be properly used in a phrase.

body.quiz: Which of the following can be least associated with the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 勺子 sháozi (spoon) End
options: Audio for 学生 xuésheng (student)
Audio for 铅笔 qiānbǐ (pencil)
Audio for 书 shū (book)
body.correct: Fabulous job! 作业 zuòyè means “homework.” To do homework, the last thing you need from the choices would be a 勺子 sháozi (spoon).
body.incorrect: So close! Think about the meaning of the word presented, then consider what in the choices you will reasonably need for it.
